org.apache.felix.ipojo.dependency.interceptors

Class DefaultDependencyInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.dependency.interceptors.DefaultDependencyInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyInterceptor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultServiceRankingInterceptor, DefaultServiceTrackingInterceptor

    public class DefaultDependencyInterceptor
extends Object
implements DependencyInterceptor
    A default implementation of the dependency interceptor. It manages the dependency list guarded by the monitor lock.
